derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French argumentatif, -ive or late Latin argumentativus, from argumentari 'conduct an argument'

entry.tran: 好辩的;好争论的;好争吵的
entry.def: Someone who is argumentative is always ready to disagree or start quarrelling with other people.

example.ex: Great chess players have a reputation for being both eccentric and argumentative...
example.tran: 国际象棋大师们以性格怪异和好与人争辩而闻名。

example.ex: You're in an argumentative mood today!
example.tran: 你今天就是找人吵架的。

means.word_mean: 1. given to or characterized by argument;

sentences.sentence: "argumentative to the point of being cantankerous"

auth_sentence.content: The Icarus Syndrome is history with an argumentative purpose.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Icarus Syndrome is history with an argumentative purpose.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"有……倾向(性质)的;……的"; 2. 表名词,"人或物等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: affirm肯定+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.赞成的,肯定的
argument争论+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.爱争论的,好辩论的
authority权威,威信+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.权威性的,命令式的
e出+voc喊+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→把感情喊出来
figu形体,用形象比喻+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.比喻的,借喻的
lucr钱+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.赚钱的,有利可图的
represent代表+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.典型的,有代表性的
talk讲话+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.罗嗦的
preserve保存+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.&n.防腐的,防腐剂
sed坐+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.&n.[药物]镇静的,镇静剂
represent描述,表示+ative人或物等→n.代表
